data.meta_description: Fern Merila | December 12, 2023 & Ashtabula, OH | Fern Frances (Duff) Merila, 92, passed away...
data.meta_site_name: Fern Merila Obituary | December 12, 2023 | Czup Funeral Home - Ashtabula, OH
data.text:
Fern Frances (Duff) Merila, 92, passed away peacefully on December 12, 2023, at Saybrook Landing in Saybrook, Ohio.

She was born on February 25, 1931, in Ashtabula, Ohio; the daughter of William and Mary (Martell) Duff.

On November 10, 1948, Fern married Paul Merila; they spent seventy-two years of loving and devoted marriage until his passing in 2021.

Fern was a homemaker who took great pride in providing a lovely home where she and Paul raised two wonderful daughters.

She enjoyed baking especially for others, doing puzzles and taking walks.

Fern is survived by her loving children: Victoria (Neil) Riippa and Paula (Guy) Korvig; her grandchildren: Debbie, Todd, Craig, Amber and Andrew; her great-grandchildren: Zachary, David, Sienna, Finley, and Emmett and her siblings: Warren Duff, Grace Loftus and Florence Erickson.

She is preceded in death by her parents; her husband, Paul in 2021; her siblings: Louis, James, William, Theodore, Eugene, John, Ella and June.

Calling hours will be held on Monday, December 18, 2023, from 11:00a â€“ 12:00p with a funeral service to follow at 12:00p at the First Grace Gospel Church, 5730 Adams Avenue in Ashtabula, Ohio, with Pastor Larry Emery officiating.
